name: Fluxion
description:
Fluxion is a thrilling 3D action platformer that will challenge even the most skilled gamers. In this fast-paced game, you'll control a spaceship as it races through a twisting and turning tunnel. Your goal is to collect energy orbs and avoid obstacles as you master the art of high-speed flight.

With tight pacing and challenging gameplay, Fluxion will keep you on the edge of your seat. As you progress through the game, the obstacles will become more difficult, testing your reflexes and timing to the limit. But don't worry, you can try as many times as you need to reach the highest score.

Featuring two game modes, Fluxion offers both competitive and challenging gameplay that will keep you coming back for more. With simple controls and endless levels, there's no limit to the excitement you'll experience as you push your skills to the limit. Are you ready to take on the challenge of Fluxion?
